title: Kirwan
body: He published meteorological data related to Funchal, which Bowdich mentioned in the Excursions in Madeira (London 1825).

Funchal: Capital of the Island of Madeira.

Bowdich: Possible author or relevant figure related to the Excursions in Madeira.

1825: Mention of meteorological data related to Funchal in the Excursions in Madeira.
